alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:20AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575 affecting Cherokee County. For the Etowah River Basin...including Landrum, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Free Home, Barrettsville, Ball Ground, Northeast Canton, East Canton Downstream I-575, Canton, Waleska, Woodstock, Big Shanty/Kennesaw, Blackwells, Woodstock, Kennesaw, Mars Hill, Below Allatoona Dam, Rockmart, Cartersville, Dallas, Kingston, Kingston, Rome GA 1 Loop, Rome Coosa Valley FG... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand in the woodlands and fields along the river generally east of Canton near the Interstate 575 bridge. A rock landing and grassy lot behind a pump station off of Riverstone Parkway and areas behind the businesses on Old Ball Ground Highway and Keith Drive are flooded with up to two feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 19.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
